name: Saybutts
description:
Saybutts is an autobiographical simulation of trying to go to bed while dealing with your house cat and the constant interference she presents.

Saybutts was developed in Twine for Porpentine's 300-word-limit game jam.

Saybutts has NOT been described by IGN as "The game that will redefine hitscan-oriented cover shooting for all triple-A games to come this console cycle".

It *HAS* been described by my friend Conner as "Hell of good. so proud C': "

And Conner is one rad guy.
